name: MaceInnovations
0:
”Alexa ask Mace for my briefing.”
”Alexa, ask Mace.”
”Alexa, open Mace.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mace
Developer Terms of Use
des: The Mace Innovations skill gives you a quick update on total loan applications, funded loan amounts month-to-date and much more! These briefings can be fully customized to include any static or piece of information that lives within encompass or any other system.
